key_risks: Environmental and regulatory risks, including landfill issues and recycling market volatility
Legal risks from class action lawsuits and labor violations
Dependence on acquisitions for growth, which may strain resources
controversies: Class action lawsuits alleging deceptive pricing practices
Strong community opposition to landfill expansions due to environmental concerns
environmental_issues: Landfill issues such as odor complaints and elevated temperatures at Chiquita Canyon Landfill
Potential groundwater contamination from landfill expansions
social_issues: Labor and employment violations, including discrimination cases
governance_issues: Legal scrutiny over pricing practices and potential reputational damage
Integration risks from heavy reliance on acquisitions
